reviewsJson.markdown:
**Setup:** Goon LP, 25g SS316L dual parallel @0.1 ohms, 99.9w power, Full Cotton wicks

**Testing:** [Liquid Nicotine Wholesalers Strawberry Banana](https://liquidnicotinewholesalers.com/lnw-strawberry-banana.html) @5%, steeped two nights.

**Flavor Description:** This reminds me so much of Yoplait Strawberry Banana yogurt (my favorite as a kid). The picture is some kind of smoothie which makes more sense because I don't actually taste any yogurt here, but that strawberry/banana ratio is almost a perfect match for Yoplait. Very creamy and sweet by itself, great balance of the two fruits (not distinctly strawberry or banana, but instead the perfect blend). 

**Off-flavors:** none

**Throat Hit:** none

**Uses & Pairings:** Smoothies, milkshakes, yogurt, maybe some fruit mixes. 5% seems like a good starting place solo (and this is GOOD solo), but I think it might need more to stand up to creams.

**Notes:** Pleasantly surprised at how good this is. The only gripe I have is that this is a bit too specific by which I mean it's probably not too versatile of a flavor. This would be great for a beginner as a standalone concentrate because it's not very concentrated (therefore quite forgiving in % of use) and delicious without any supporting flavors.

**Second Opinions:** None yet; however, I did see that someone has linked my notes on e-liquid-recipes.

Edit: forgot a word.
reviewsJson.author: PerennialPhilosopher
reviewsJson.title: Strawberry Banana
